snippet: The Dynamo took a big step toward the Major League Soccer Eastern Conference final after a 2-0 home win against Sporting Kansas City.
abstract: San Jose Earthquakes defeat Los Angeles Galaxy, 1-0, in MLS Western Conference semifinal opener; Houston Dynamo beat Sporting Kansas City, 2-0, to take big step toward Eastern Conference final.
lead_paragraph: The Dynamo took a big step toward the Major League Soccer Eastern Conference final after a 2-0 home win against Sporting Kansas City.
